Type.Name: ClipboardReceivedFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ClipboardReceivedFunc(Clipboard clipboard, SelectionData selection_data);
.class public auto ansi sealed ClipboardReceivedFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Delegate that specifies the shape of methods that run when the clipboard receives data.
